TopicTitle: After Hours Trying to Install Interstallar V2, It Was Worth It

Articles.Content:
![jtgunho.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jtgunho.jpg)

As the pack is supposedly unusable in .90 i wasn't sure how people where using it. I decided it wasn't going to be hard and tried. I almost quit but im glas i didn't

OMG. Such Beautiful Many Amazing

EDIT: Good Job. You appear to have potential.
Interstellar V2 always makes my mouth drop. Awesome pic!

> 
> How did you install it?

i installed everything, including all the bits it said where essential but optional, then i ran it with -force-opengl and it worked. every time it starts it says its nor responding for a minute though.

I think the issue was that ksp caps the ram usage on start up and so you have to try and optimize the launch of it so it doesn't cap out
how do I do this -force-opengl thing?

> 
> how do I do this -force-opengl thing?

I just typed ksp force OpenGL in Google and it came up with a how to as I new it was necessary to launch the game

Really is a nice mod isn't it.

I turned Laythe's clouds this wonderful pink color.

Also, this is my 350th post!

-DMSP

Aha! Someone else who understands! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). This mod is amazing and I can't wait for the next release. Though because I stream and make vids, I am using the "whispy mid-alternative" clouds to run well with the other visual mods I use. I personally am more of a fan of the whispy textures though.
